TopicTitle: Should there be other life-forms living in Kerbin in later versions of KSP?

Articles.Content:
Hi guys, thanks for answering my 2 discussions.

Hey, do you want other life-forms living in Kerbin in later versions of KSP?

Ex. Animals, sea creatures

Note: I do not invoke predators of Kermans.

Thanks.

"Knowledge is Power"

Edited January 18, 2014 by RocketScientist00
Squad already said that they are never adding NPCs at all.

Squad already said that they are never adding NPCs at all.

Well they should make it modable so we can add it if we want.
Agreed. Never in the stock game ever, but once a suitable mod comes out, you're good to go.
